content: How does one search by negative vote?

@Eric Haas What do you mean by "search by negative vote"? Do you mean "search for all things that have a negative vote recorded against them"? If so, we don't have that (yet). We do have this: issueFunction in InBallot("2019-Sep - FHIR IG CDex R1 STU", "NEG") which lets you find those issues that have outstanding negative votes for the specified ballot. If need be, I could possibly modify that function so it could just take InBallot("NEG") or possibly even InBallot() which could find all issues that were referenced in a ballot of some sort whether affirmative or negative. Let me know what you'd actually use and I'll see what I can do...
I think that the issueFunction query is what I was looking for thanks
